content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Offshore pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0) and a pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5) and another pipe group at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5) and an electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of a transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5) and another transport belt at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
### Errors when using furnaces without ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have ingredients before using them
### Errors when using steam engines without connection to a power network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power network before using them
### Errors when using offshore pumps without proper pipe connections
- Ensure that offshore pumps have proper pipe connections before using them
### Errors when using inserter entities without source items
- Ensure that inserter entities have source items before using them

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
